changes: Relocated 'bed_1' from the west wall to the east wall. The proposed placement was too close to the main entrance, violating the rule that the bed should be hidden and not the first thing seen.
Relocated 'sofa_1' from the east wall to the west wall to accommodate the bed's new, correct position and to maintain a clear, straight walking path from the door to the desk.
Moved 'nightstand_1' and 'nightstand_2' to the east wall to flank the relocated bed.
Moved 'artwork_1' to the west wall to be placed above the relocated sofa.
Moved 'artwork_2' to the east wall to be placed above the relocated bed.
Refined the placement of 'rug_2'. The original instruction was ambiguous; it is now specified as a runner next to the bed's new location.
Adjusted 'plant_1' to the southeast corner to better define the corner between the desk and the new bed area.

refined_placements.table_1: Centered on the south wall, pushed flush against the wall directly under the two windows.
refined_placements.chair_1: Positioned at table_1, on the north side of the table, facing the south wall.
refined_placements.chair_2: Positioned at table_1, next to chair_1, also facing the south wall.
refined_placements.bed_1: In the northeast corner of the main living area, with the headboard pushed flush against the east wall. This places it away from the direct line of sight from the entrance.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Placed against the east wall, on the north side of bed_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Placed against the east wall, on the south side of bed_1.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Pushed flush against the center of the west wall, opposite the bed, keeping the central path clear.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered above bed_1.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the southeast corner of the room, between the desk and the bed area.
refined_placements.rug_1: Centered on the floor in the work zone, positioned under the front legs of table_1 and its chairs.
refined_placements.rug_2: Placed on the floor on the west side of bed_1, acting as a runner.
